Informations >

Here you can configure a chart by changing the values in the form on the left side of the page.

After every change, the code to plot the chart is updated.
The checkboxes on the left indicate if you use the custom value (checked) or the default value (unchecked) of the options.
To change the options of a collapsed group, you must click on its title.

Please, report any bug here.

This playground is from the code present in the SVN trunk, so any bug found here doesn't concern the downloadable Zip.

I recommend using Firefox, Opera, Chrome or Safari instead of Internet Explorer as it is really slow and all the features probably won't work.
